attributes.action: replace the national anthem with "Blue Monday" by New Order
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the people of Great Britain desire a more modern national anthem to represent and reflect the cosmopolitan, vibrant and multicultural country we are today.

With all the discussion of "Britishness" and the identity crisis which many Britons seem to suffer from today, a good old indie dance track such as Blue Monday would undoubtedly bring everyone together in a good old skool mash up.

Out go the stuffy old brass bands reflective of our imperial and intolerant past and in come the synthesisers and drum machines which represent the modern, liberal, British way.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
